column1: Just received an A+ rating from @StopBigMoney’s Action Fund scorecard - the first A+ I’ve earned in my life! As the only member of Congress to refuse all💰from PACs federal lobbyists and fellow members of Congress I’m on a mission to make that the rule - not the exception. https://t.co/b6xcnB6hZG

Amy K All the Way! I’m proud to support @AmyKlobuchar for President because America needs her experience strength leadership and ability to transcend partisanship. I took a fun trip with her down memory lane a couple years ago. Have a look👇🏼https://t.co/zIpP6V1YX7

An entire community joins me in celebrating Officer Mike Kirchen of the @MinneapolisPD and the @bikecopsforkids team - one of the most innovative impactful programs of its kind in the country. Have a look! https://t.co/bdh1Nl8Dtf via @TODAYshow

Over 100 of you came for the opening of our Campaign Coffeehouse - a place for people of all ages to hang-out enjoy some coffee create something learn something or make some new friends. This team is remarkable and our campaign is a family like none other. #DeanTeam2020 https://t.co/CVbwojczxu

Representing Minnesota’s 3rd district in Congress has been one of the great blessings of my life. I wish everyone a year filled with health happiness and prosperity. Keep the faith as our best days are yet to come. https://t.co/cBDC6xGefs

Thanks Woody! I’ll always have the cleanest coat in Congress. No PAC 💰. No federal lobbyist 💰. And no 💰 from fellow members of Congress or their committees. We must make that the standard not the exception. https://t.co/734cLYnYn9
Congrats to the winners of today’s elections gratitude to everyone who ran and a huge shout-out to the armies of volunteers who bring joy purpose and inspiration to campaigns. #Election2019

Dan is a courageous veteran devoted father and husband and my good friend. He will be principled and independent-minded member of Congress at a time when we need a lot more of both. I hope you’ll join me in supporting him! https://t.co/QrEXochCaa

Public service takes a real toll on families and couples. Counseling strengthens relationships and should be encouraged not demeaned. Shame on the @NRCC for mocking the wonderful wife of a member of Congress my dear friend @JoeCunninghamSC. #familyvalues https://t.co/dNapcPqMrE

My letter to Mitch McConnell @senatemajldr who has been obstructing legislative process in the Senate and refuses to allow a vote on #HR8 and #HR1112. Please join me in demanding that he place principle over party.  https://t.co/1MPs8YoT2f
@zrodvold @EdinaMN Happy anniversary boss!🙌🏻🇺🇸 You’re the best in the business.

I’m humbled and inspired by the #DeanTeam’s ongoing volunteer work in our community from serving meals to cleaning-up trash along 394 to packing 7000 lbs of apples last evening at @2harvest. Helping one another is the andidote to our challenges and everyone’s invited! https://t.co/Tq2BJyyvcv
No PAC $. No federal lobbyist $. Let’s make that the standard rather than the exception. https://t.co/9utdlZqydK

From the hearty handful who came out to see me at the Government Repair Ice Shack to the thousands at Boom Island for @amyklobuchar’s winter wonderland announcement I ❤️ Minnesota the #BoldNorth and #AmyForAmerica! https://t.co/dTBBktRWnb

I ask for forgiveness and will remove Minny from my written lexicon immediately. In honor of @ericdayton and my fellow frozen brothers and sisters I shall officially replace it with NORTH in the future.Thank you! 🙌🏻

I’m continuously WOWED by extraordinary members of the #DeanTeam who share their time and energy to help communities and people in need. That 4310 lbs ain’t no small potatoes! 🥔 https://t.co/wBLE48O9Ee
A 3 degree shack-a-delic reunion of some of my favorite people in the world on frozen Lake Minnetonka yesterday. https://t.co/gfwxMMZfd9
